titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 956) to establish legal standards and procedures for product liability litigation, and for other purposes.

action.text: Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 956 with 2 hours of general debate. After general debate the Committee of the Whole shall rise without motion. No further consideration of the bill shall be in order except pursuant to a subsequent order of the House.
The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 104-69, by Mr. Linder.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 29.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 3/7/1995--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 956 (legal standards and procedures for product liability litigation).
